articles.title: Hiring in the Indian IT sector shrinks for the first time in 25 years - Business Standard
articles.description: Indian IT Sector Hiring: The workforce in the top 10 Indian IT companies fell to 2.06 million at the end of the July-September quarter, a fall of 51,744 people

articles.title: AU, Fincare small finance banks to merge | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Under the amalgamation plan, shareholders of Fincare Small Finance Bank will get 579 equity shares of AU Small Finance Bank Ltd for every 2,000 fully paid-up equity shares they own.
